Module f22_hw06_comp310_f22_hw06_03
Package model.balls

Interface IBall

All Superinterfaces:
IBallHost<IBall>, IExtVisitorHost<IBallHostID,IBall>, IObserver<IBallCmd>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ABall, DefaultBall, DiscoBall, ErrorBall, PredatorBall, PreyBall
public interface IBall extends IObserver<IBallCmd>, IBallHost<IBall>
The interface for a ball
Author:
Phoebe Scaccia

      void move()
      Moves the ball according to its velocity.

    • bounce

      boolean bounce()
      Determines if a ball should bounce. If it should, set its position and velocity accordingly.
      Returns:
      true if the ball bounced, false otherwise.

    • updateState

      didBounce - whether the ball just bounced or not
